summary: This is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) prosecutors discussing draft press remarks and Q&A documents in preparation for a potential press conference related to the indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell. The emails show coordination on messaging strategy.

persons.name: Audrey
persons.context: Mentioned as someone who will likely be conservative in press remarks, keeping statements tightly tethered to the language of the indictment draft.

events.title: Preparation of Press Materials for Maxwell Indictment
events.description: Prosecutors from the SDNY exchange drafts of press remarks and a Q&A document in preparation for a potential press conference regarding the indictment of Ghislaine Maxwell.

keyFacts: The document is internal email correspondence between SDNY prosecutors dated June 26, 2020.
The subject is preparing press remarks and a Q&A document related to an indictment, specifically for Ghislaine Maxwell.
One prosecutor notes that a colleague, 'Audrey', is expected to be conservative in public statements, sticking closely to the indictment language.
The emails indicate active coordination within the prosecution team ahead of a potential public announcement.
An attachment named 'Maxwell_possible_QA.doc' is referenced, confirming the subject of the preparation.
